mapper.select: select r.roomCode, r.userCode as receiverCode, userDetail.name as receive, messageRoom.latestdate, (select count(*) from message where roomCode=r.roomCode and receiverCode=#{userCode} and readFlag=0) as unread from (select * from roomUser where roomCode in (select roomCode from roomUser where userCode=#{userCode}) and userCode!=#{userCode}) as r join userDetail join messageRoom where r.userCode = userDetail.userCode and r.roomCode = messageRoom.roomCode

select *, (select userDetail.name from userDetail where temp.senderCode = userDetail.userCode) as senderName, (select userDetail.name from userDetail where temp.receiverCode = userDetail.userCode) as receiverName from (select * from message where roomCode=#{roomCode} and messageCode < #{messageCode} order by sendDate desc limit 35) temp
select * from roomUser where roomCode in (select roomCode from roomUser where userCode=#{senderCode}) and userCode=#{receiverCode}
select count(*) from message where receiverCode=#{receiverCode} and readFlag=0
